coggame
Class Sprite

java.lang.Object
  coggame.Layer
      coggame.Sprite

public class Sprite
extends Layer

Sprites are Layers designed to display simple frame-based animations, and also provide facilities for transforming frames and performing collision checks with other Sprites and TiledLayers.

Set the current animation frame. Frames are 1-indexed.

collidesWith

public boolean collidesWith(Sprite s)
Returns true if the collision box of this Sprite intersects with the collision box of the other Sprite.

Parameters:

collidesWith

public boolean collidesWith(TiledLayer t)
Returns true if the collision box of this Sprite intersects with any non-zero tiles of the TiledLayer.

Parameters:
t - the TiledLayer to check intersection with.
